reviews.customers_say: Customers find the pajamas soft and sexy, with one mentioning the fabric is suitable for all seasons. However, the sizing receives mixed feedback, with several customers finding it too small. The shorts' length is also a concern for some customers.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love wearing my new PJ!
items.body: I’m not used to wearing PJs but I thought of making a change. I have seen videos of people wearing silk PJs and they look luxurious. I was searching to invest one and found this brand. I was hoping it will meet my expectation and surprisingly, it did. I wear S and it is true to size. It is a bit loose to move comfortably. The fabric is soft to touch. I’m 5’3” and the short is just right. My only comment is that the top is a bit tight under the arm. Otherwise, it is just what I’m looking for and what I need. The price is pricey which expected for a good quality silk. I haven’t tried washing it yet but I’m hopeful that the quality won’t change. Read more
items.author: RL

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Silk, a fabric for all seasons.
items.body: I bought several silk items at one time. Silk is amazing. It's warm for winter, like silk turtlenecks, and cool for summer in tops such as tank tops. It feels wonderful against the skin. It's hypoallergenic. I hand wash all my silks and hang dry, smoothing the fabric especially along seams, plackets, collars and pockets. I rarely need to iron anything and don't experience any shrinkage. Read more
items.author: Lil Bit

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pleasant pj
items.body: Nice pj, but sizing is too small. Size M feels more like S, especially the shorts. Read more
items.author: Julija Mielnik

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars SO comfortable!!
items.body: It is REAL 100% mulberry silk. Very soft, breathable, light and smooth. Read more
items.author: fairyland

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Shorts run small, shirt runs large, but very nice PJs
items.body: This was almost perfect, but the shorts run very small and the shirt runs big. Still flattering in an XL because the shirt drapes nicely, but those shorts are so tight and skimpy, wish they had a long inseam and looser elastic waistband. I find elastic waistbands to be very uncomfortable unless they are flat and wider, not digging in to whatever flesh/fat/bone you may have. Read more
items.author: Marcia

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars The shorts are very short and run small.
items.body: The images are very misleading. The shorts are short shorts with about a 1.5 inch inseam. The model must be wearing the shorts very low on her hips. Admittedly I don’t look like the model but on me the top almost completely covers the shorts. When I looked at the sizing I assumed (wrongly) that length for the shorts (about 9 inches) was the inseam. Also as many reviewers noted, the shorts run small. Almost everything indicated I should be medium (my usual size). Fortunately I ordered large. The top is very roomy. Not what I was hoping for. I’d probably return the set but I need them right now now for a trip. Read more
items.author: Marcie C.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful silk
items.body: This is a lovely set of pj’s. Really helped with hot flashes. The color is a luxurious deep blue, very elegant. Read more
items.author: Patricia H.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well Made, Fits Well, Extremely Comfortable, Good Value
items.body: I recently acquired these silk pajamas as a gift for my girlfriend, and they have been met with immense appreciation. The fabric is truly exceptional, exhibiting a remarkable softness and smoothness that feels luxurious against the skin. It's incredibly lightweight, providing a comfortable and airy sensation, and the gentle touch of the silk is a delight to wear. The pajamas possess an undeniable elegance, with a design that's both sophisticated and refined. They are perfectly suited for creating a relaxing and indulgent atmosphere, making them ideal for unwinding at the end of the day. This silk pajama set proved to be a wonderful and thoughtfully chosen gift, conveying a sense of care and consideration. I wholeheartedly and without reservation recommend them to anyone seeking a luxurious and comfortable sleepwear option. Read more
items.author: Parks N' Tech

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Khaki, White, Navy Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
